Test 12: Base64 Edge Cases

Testing base64 encoding variations that may cause parser issues

Standard Base64 PNG Valid
Standard PNG, proper padding (==)
Single Padding (=) Valid
Ends with single = padding
No Padding Edge
Missing padding (some parsers add it)
Base64 SVG Valid
SVG as base64 (text → binary → base64)
Long Base64 String Edge
100x100 PNG, ~1KB base64 string
URL-safe Base64 Edge
Contains + and / (might get URL-encoded)
GIF as Base64 Valid
GIF87a format as base64
WebP as Base64 Valid
WebP format (modern browsers only)
ICO as Base64 Edge
ICO format as base64
CSS url() Base64 Valid
background-image: url(data:...base64...)
Base64 in srcset Edge
srcset with base64 data URIs
Base64 with Charset Edge
charset=utf-8 before base64
Minimal Base64 Tricky
1x1 transparent GIF (minimal)
Unicode in SVG Base64 Edge
SVG with ✓ unicode character
Unquoted CSS url() Edge
url() without quotes around data URI
Plain SVG Data URI Valid
URL-encoded SVG (not base64)
JPEG Base64 Valid
Minimal JPEG (SOI + headers + EOI)
BMP Base64 Edge
BMP format as base64

CSS Base64 Tests

Multiple BG Images Edge
Two base64 images layered in CSS
Base64 Cursor Edge
Hover for custom cursor
cursor: url(data:...base64...)
List Style Image Edge
  • Item one
  • Item two
  • Item three
list-style-image: url(data:...)
Border Image Tricky
border-image: url(data:...base64...)
